tools: regexes

25 Apr 2016 | tools

There’s a saying:
“Trying to solve a problem with regexes? Now, you have two problems.”

Complex expressions that are nearly impossible to validate.

Regular Expressions are a great tool for searching and manipulating text.
The standard from unix tools like grep, find, and sed to Excel.

So, let’s get finding.

objective-c: interaction patterns

04 Apr 2016 | objective-c 
         ^
         | D
Verbose  |
         |       N
         |       
         |                  B
         |                              K
         ------------------------------------->
                   Subtle

D = Delegate patterns
B = Block patterns
N = Notifications
K = Key Value Observation

There are 4 common communciation patterns in Objective-C.

Ever wonder how they can be misused?

You can find real explanations of what they are in short here and in long here.
